I have a shop (Greggs) with a shopkeeper, I want to player to be able to 'ask shopkeeper for sausage roll', but it will only work if the player types 'ask shopkeeper ABOUT sausage rolls.'  Am I missing a simple solution?

I could have the shopkeeer say "what will it be Sir?" and the take text input, but would prefer to do the above if possible.
